patches.content:
@@ -1,1405 +0,0 @@
-class Animal:%0A    def __init__(self, specie: str, sound: str):%0A        self.specie: str = specie%0A        self.sound: str = sound%0A        self.age: int = 0%0A%0A    def __str__(self) -%3E str:%0A        return f%22%7Bself.specie%7D:%7Bself.age%7D:%7Bself.sound%7D%22%0A%0A    def ageBy(self, increment: int) -%3E None:%0A        if self.age == 4:%0A            print(f%22warnig: %7Bself.specie%7D morreu%22)%0A            return%0A        self.age += increment%0A        if self.age %3E= 4:%0A            self.age = 4%0A            print(f%22warning: %7Bself.specie%7D morreu%22)%0A%0A    def ismakeSound(self) -%3E str:%0A        if self.age == 0:%0A            return %22---%22%0A        if self.age == 1:%0A            return self.sound%0A        if self.age == 2:%0A            return self.sound%0A        if self.age == 3:%0A            return self.sound%0A        if self.age == 4:%0A            return %22RIP%22%0A%0Adef main():%0A    animal: Animal = Animal(%22%22, %22%22)%0A    while True:%0A%0A        line:str = input()%0A        print(%22$%22 + line)%0A        args: list%5Bstr%5D = line.split(%22 %22)%0A%0A        if args%5B0%5D == %22ens%22:%0A            break%0A        if args%5B0%5D == %22init%22:%0A            specie: str = args%5B1%5D%0A            sound: str = args%5B2%5D%0A            animal = Animal(specie, sound)%0A        if args%5B0%5D == %22show%22:%0A            print(animal)%0A        if args%5B0%5D == %22grow%22:%0A            increment: int =(args%5B1%5D)%0A            animal.ageBy(increment)%0A        if args%5B0%5D == %22noise%22:%0A            print(animal.ismakeSound())%0A%0A%0A%0A
